video_identification.title: Interviews with Palestinian refugees in Lebanon / مقابلات مع لاجئين فلسطينيين في لبنان

extracted_metadata.title: Interviews with Palestinian refugees in Lebanon / مقابلات مع لاجئين فلسطينيين في لبنان
extracted_metadata.description: Nakba archive 2008 by Diana Allan (short version) Interviewers: ISMAIL SHAMMOUT Year of birth: 1923 From: Lydda, District of Ramla, Palestine Residence in Lebanon: Ein el-Hilweh Refugee Camp MERIAM OTHMAN Year of birth: 1937 From:Husseiniyeh, District of Safad, Palestine Residence in Lebanon: Burj al-Shamali Refugee Camp GEORGE FARAJ Year of birth: 1924 From: Jerusalem, District of Palestine Residence in Lebanon: Beirut more about the project: http://nakba-archive.org/
